name: market for maintenance, tanker, for liquid goods other than petroleum and liquefied natural gas | maintenance, tanker, for liquid goods other than petroleum and liquefied natural gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21933/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'maintenance, tanker for liquid goods other than petroleum and liquefied natural gas', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of maintenance, tanker for liquid goods other than petroleum and liquefied natural gas, with a load capacity (DWT) of 72,000 tonnes. The service includes the needed materials (steel, paints, etc), emissions, waste and energy required for sandblasting.  

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
